* [[Morgoth]] renewed his assault against [[Hithlum]]. 
** At [[Barad Eithel]], [[Galdor (Lord of Dor-lómin)|Galdor]] was slain and [[Húrin]] became [[Lord of Dor-lómin]]; he drove the Orcs back from the walls and into the [[Anfauglith]].<ref name="Annals"/><ref name="Ruin">{{S|18}}</ref>
** [[Fingon]] faced a separate army coming down from the north and, outnumbered, was hard pressed to hold them back and battle spilled into the plains of Hithlum. [[Círdan]], however, sent aid and landed his forces in [[Drengist]] which then fell upon the west flank of the [[Orc]]s. The Orcs then broke and fled, pursued by horsed archers.<ref name="Annals"/><ref name="Ruin"/>

== Between 455 and 462 ==
* At was noted that at sometime prior to this year, Morgoth's army which had driven into [[East Beleriand]] following the [[Dagor Bragollach]] had been utterly destroyed. It was initially broken by [[Thingol]] on the borders of [[Doriath]], with the scattered part that departed south never seen again, that which went north destroyed by [[Maedhros]], and that which went east near the mountains hunted by [[Dwarves of the Blue Mountains|Dwarves]].<ref name="Annals">{{GA|170-2}}, pp. 59-60</ref>
